plot: A man must marry by noon or lose his inheritance. It's 11:50 a.m. and he can't find his fiancée.
title: Matrimony's Speed Limit
plot_es: A man must marry by noon or lose his inheritance. It's 11:50 a.m. and he can't find his fiancée.
plot_en: A man must marry by noon or lose his inheritance. It's 11:50 a.m. and he can't find his fiancée.
